医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现帮助癌细胞逃避 CAR T 细胞治疗的关键蛋白质City of Hope 是美国最大、最先进的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，其国家医疗中心被《美国新闻与世界报道》评为全国癌症前五名，该公司的科学家们已经找到了帮助癌细胞的棘手罪魁祸首。逃避 CAR T 细胞治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Scientists-discover-key- Protein-that-helps-cancer-cells-evade-CAR-T-cell-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Scientists-discover-key- Protein-that-helps-cancer-cells-evade-CAR-T-cell-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=851485be-abf9-4ac5-bdfa-b3ebaca800ba Tue, 17 Dec 2024 12:57:38 -0500 Scientists discover key protein that helps cancer cells evade CAR T cell therapy
斑马鱼研究揭示氯胺酮如何影响脑细胞来治疗抑郁症已有数十年历史的麻醉剂氯胺酮可能会改变治疗严重抑郁症的游戏规则，但该药物的作用原理仍然存在许多问题，包括它到底如何影响大脑细胞和回路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Zebrafish-study-uncovers-how-ketamine-affects-brain-cells-to-treat-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Zebrafish-study-uncovers-how-ketamine-affects-brain-cells-to-treat-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ada2ffa-4c48-436f-bae9-a282912ed780 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 12:46:54 -0500 Zebrafish study uncovers how ketamine affects brain cells to treat depression
对奖励的神经反应迟钝预示着青少年患有抑郁症最新研究表明，青少年对接受奖励的神经反应减弱可以预测抑郁症的首次发作，但不能预测焦虑或自杀倾向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Blunted-neural-response-to-rewards-predicts-depression-in-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Blunted-neural-response-to-rewards-predicts-depression-in-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=600c721f-d2b7-4305-806b-aa5f95892299 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 12:37:14 -0500 Blunted neural response to rewards predicts depression in teens
研究揭示交接过程中负面语言对患者护理的影响当医生和护士将患者信息从一个班次传递到另一个班次时 -；称为“切换”的交换-；他们关起门来使用的具体词语比他们意识到的更重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-reveals-impact-of- Negative-language-in-handoffs-on-病人-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-reveals-impact-of- Negative-language-in-handoffs-on-病人-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ba6014e-8e92-4fe9-96b7-1e988f477fbf Tue, 17 Dec 2024 12:31:16 -0500 Study reveals impact of negative language in handoffs on patient care
研究表明因流感住院的儿童抗病毒药物使用不足尽管国家医疗指南支持对诊断出流感的幼儿使用抗病毒药物，但最近的一项研究报告称，这种治疗方法的使用不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-reveals-underuse-of-antivirals-for-children-hospitalized-with-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-reveals-underuse-of-antivirals-for-children-hospitalized-with-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1c49493-57a8-4aa7-8170-4eff78accfe2 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 12:21:14 -0500 Study reveals underuse of antivirals for children hospitalized with influenza
研究：近 75% 的澳大利亚青少年患有抑郁或焦虑一项新研究表明，澳大利亚近四分之三的青少年经历过临床上显着的抑郁或焦虑症状，其中大多数是慢性症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-Nearly-7525-of-Australian-adolescents-experience-depression-or-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-Nearly-7525-of-Australian-adolescents-experience-depression-or-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a098ccbf-ff0b-49e2-8f61-4dc66ca279a6 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 12:13:00 -0500 Study: Nearly 75% of Australian adolescents experience depression or anxiety
南加州大学诺里斯癌症医院连续第四年被评为最佳教学医院南加州大学诺里斯癌症医院连续第四年被领先的国家患者安全监督组织 Leapfrog Group 评为顶级教学医院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/USC-Norris-Cancer-Hospital-named-Top-Teaching-Hospital-for-the-fourth-consecutive-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/USC-Norris-Cancer-Hospital-named-Top-Teaching-Hospital-for-the-fourth-consecutive-year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b919fc3c-e311-475b-9517-fdbee251bedd Tue, 17 Dec 2024 12:03:11 -0500 USC Norris Cancer Hospital named Top Teaching Hospital for the fourth consecutive year
研究人员揭示了血管形成的关键机制血管的形成是一个复杂的过程，涉及蛋白质和机械力的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Researchers-uncover-key-mechanisms-in-blood-vessel-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Researchers-uncover-key-mechanisms-in-blood-vessel-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fc32b8c-9f89-4cb5-82d8-282b7f2a6e2c Tue, 17 Dec 2024 11:59:05 -0500 Researchers uncover key mechanisms in blood vessel formation
化学化合物在成像扫描中照亮了难治性癌症研究人员使用一种化合物在成像扫描中点亮难治性癌症，这一突破可以帮助医疗专业人员更好地瞄准和治疗癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Chemical-compound-lights-up-treatment-pressive-cancers-on-imaging-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Chemical-compound-lights-up-treatment-pressive-cancers-on-imaging-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=141b8cc0-6208-4e27-9391-187b44b29f70 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 11:46:46 -0500 Chemical compound lights up treatment-resistant cancers on imaging scans
研究揭示了大脑如何处理基本的学习计算和社交互动在一次全面的基因组新闻采访中，天普大学药物滥用研究中心助理教授 Munir Gunes Kutlu 博士揭示了有关我们的大脑如何处理基本学习计算和社交互动的革命性发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Research-reveals-how-the-brain-processes-fundamental-learning-calculations-and-social-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Research-reveals-how-the-brain-processes-fundamental-learning-calculations-and-social-interactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8eefe49c-1d24-40f6-9c42-72ce46a22f04 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 11:35:50 -0500 Research reveals how the brain processes fundamental learning calculations and social interactions
